sentences.en: Be sure you get your daily quota of calcium.
sentences.cn: 要确保每天的钙摄入量。

sentences.en: Come along, lad. Time for you to get home.
sentences.cn: 来吧，小伙子。你该回家了。

sentences.en: Don’t get upset.
sentences.cn: 别难过。

sentences.en: Eat your dinner before it gets cold.
sentences.cn: 吃饭吧，一会儿就凉了。

sentences.en: He calmed down as he got older.
sentences.cn: 他的性子随着年龄增长变得平和了。

sentences.en: He cleared his throat to get our attention.
sentences.cn: 他清清嗓子来引起我们的注意。

sentences.en: He told us to get stuffed so we leaned on his kid.
sentences.cn: 他叫我们滚蛋，于是我们威胁他的孩子。

sentences.en: how to get ahead in advertising.
sentences.cn: 如何在广告方面取得成功。

sentences.en: I didn't get a wink of sleep on the aeroplane.
sentences.cn: 我在飞机上没合一下眼。

sentences.en: I feel it's done me good to get it off my chest.
sentences.cn: 我感觉吐吐苦水对我有好处。

sentences.en: I get a bit uptight these days. Hormones, I suppose.
sentences.cn: 这些天我有点焦躁。我看是荷尔蒙在作怪。

sentences.en: I get very nervous because I'm using a lot of expensive equipment.
sentences.cn: 因为正在使用很多昂贵的设备，所以我非常紧张。

sentences.en: I got 98% in my last maths test.
sentences.cn: 上一次数学考试我得了98分。

sentences.en: I got a few games free when I bought my computer.
sentences.cn: 我买电脑的时候得到了几个免费的游戏。

sentences.en: I tried again to get ahold of my cousin Joan.
sentences.cn: 我再次尝试联系我的表妹琼。

sentences.en: I use the short-wave radio to get the latest war news.
sentences.cn: 我用短波收音机收听最新的战事新闻。

sentences.en: I'll find out and get back to you.
sentences.cn: 我会弄清楚然后再给你个回复。

sentences.en: If you wait, all that happens is that you get older.
sentences.cn: 如果你等待，发生的只有变老。

sentences.en: It would be a good idea to get professional advice.
sentences.cn: 征求专业人士的意见，这个主意很好。

sentences.en: It's almost a foregone conclusion that you'll get what you want.
sentences.cn: 你将得到你想要的，这几乎是确定无疑的。

sentences.en: let's get down to business.
sentences.cn: 我们抓紧干正事吧。

sentences.en: She got loads of presents.
sentences.cn: 她收到了许多礼物。

sentences.en: She soon got bored with the job.
sentences.cn: 她不久就厌倦了这份工作。

sentences.en: Students often travel hundreds of miles to get here.
sentences.cn: 学生常常赶数百英里的路来到这里。

sentences.en: the person who gets the highest score
sentences.cn: 得分最高的人

sentences.en: there are getting on for 700 staff.
sentences.cn: 员工人数正接近700人。

sentences.en: They get angry if they think they are being treated disrespectfully.
sentences.cn: 他们要是觉得受到了怠慢，就会大动肝火。

sentences.en: This is getting silly.
sentences.cn: 这事越来越荒唐了。

sentences.en: Try to get a feeling for the people who live here.
sentences.cn: 试着去理解在这片土地上生息的人们。

sentences.en: We get a lot of junk mail.
sentences.cn: 我们收到许多垃圾邮件。

sentences.en: We got to Paris that evening.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上我们到了巴黎。

sentences.en: We need to get help quickly!
sentences.cn: 我们需要马上得到帮助！

sentences.en: What did you get for Christmas?
sentences.cn: 你圣诞节收到了什么礼物？

sentences.en: What time will we get there?
sentences.cn: 我们什么时候可以到那里？

sentences.en: you get in there son, and you work.
sentences.cn: 你要积极行动，孩子，而且要真干。

sentences.en: You may be able to get a grant from the local authority.
sentences.cn: 你也许可以从当地政府获得拨款。

sentences.en: You'll need to get on the right side of Carmela.
sentences.cn: 你得讨卡梅拉的欢心。

words.tran_cn: 获得；了解（get的现在分词）；抓住

phrases.tran_cn: 回来；恢复；取回；重新上台
(非正式)采取积极行动（以实现目标）（常用于劝戒）
v. 动身；免于受罚；从…下来；脱下（衣服等）
把意思说清楚，使想法被理解
到达那里；取得成功，实现目标
通过；到达；做完；接通电话
(贬)想暴发致富的，以暴发致富为目的的
(主英)接近（某个时刻、年龄或数目）；几乎

trans.tran_en: to receive something that someone gives you or sends you

trans.tran_cn: 收到，获得，变得，受到惩罚，使处于，购买，达到，来到，感染上，与…联系，开始做，使移动到，有机会做，搭乘，抓住，使…受伤，理解，使烦恼
trans.tran_en: to obtain something by finding it, asking for it, or paying for it
to obtain something by finding it, asking for it, or paying for it
